item.title: Ruth add a quote by Parker J. Palmer
item.description: "If we want to grow as teachers -- we must do something alien to academic culture: we must talk to each other about our inner lives -- risky stuff in a profession that fears the personal and seeks safety in the technical, the distant, the abstract." -- Parker J. Palmer

item.title: Ruth add a quote by Parker Palmer
item.description: "I want my inner truth to be the plumb line for the choices I make about my life - about the work that I do and how I do it, about the relationships I enter into and how I conduct them." -- Parker Palmer
